item.title: Getting Started: C++ in Visual Studio Code
item.description: In this quick guide, we will install C++ to use with Visual Studio Code in Windows 10. Pre-Requisites Latest version of Visual Studio Code installed Installing C++ As the first step, we will get C++ installed. We will be using free, opensource GNU compiler made available via the MinGW-w64 (Minimalist GNU for Windows). More information on MinGW is available at mingw.org The installer can directly be downloaded from Sourceforge by visiting:
